channel.title: 317 [PI] Not Working on Mac Computer
channel.description: My RSPS does not load on macbook computers. When players try to open up the downloadable client to play on mac, it just shows a plain white screen, and doesnt load anything. Please help :|

item.title: 317 [PI] Not Working on Mac Computer
item.dc:creator: @arean1 arean1
item.description:
@arean1 wrote:

If your client is downloading the cache change the cache download locations to user home directory that worked fine for my client.

{System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/”};

Let me know if that works for you.

Make a run.command with texteditor
add this code in it:

#!/bin/sh cd "$(dirname "$0")" java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

Run that for your client on MAC and the cache download directory listed above lets it download the cache on mac now.

Read full topic
